pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access Victorian Spatial Data Through Web File Services (WFS) // Easily interfaces R to spatial datasets available through the Victorian Government's WFS (Web Feature Service): https://servi ces.land.vic.gov.au/catalogue/publicproxy/guest/dv_geoserver/wf s?request=getCapabilities, which allows users to read in 'sf' data from these sources. VicmapR uses the lazy querying approach and code developed by Teucher et al. (2021) for the 'bcdata' R package doi:10.21105/joss.02927.
